basics.name: Aung Myo Kyaw
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Passionate and dedicated IT professional with expertise in solution architecture, DevOps, and full-stack development. I specialize in designing scalable, efficient systems and driving end-to-end development with Agile practices and robust CI/CD pipelines. Committed to coding excellence, automation, and continuous learning, I excel in collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions.

projects.name: DevFolio AI
projects.description: A personal portfolio website generator based on a JSON schema, enhanced with AI capabilities for content generation.
highlights: Integrated Gemini API for AI-powered cover letter generation.
Designed a clean, responsive UI with Tailwind CSS.
Implemented a dynamic 'Show More' feature for scalable content display.

projects.name: Cloud-Based CI/CD Pipeline
projects.description: A fully automated CI/CD pipeline for a microservices-based application using AWS services.
highlights: Increased deployment frequency from monthly to on-demand.
Implemented automated testing and quality gates.

projects.name: Real-time Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Developed a real-time data analytics dashboard for visualizing key business metrics.
highlights: Used WebSockets for live data updates.
Created interactive charts and graphs with D3.js.
Handled high-volume data streams with Node.js.

projects.name: E-commerce Platform Migration
projects.description: Led the migration of a monolithic e-commerce platform to a microservices architecture.
highlights: Improved system scalability and fault tolerance.
